short_summary: Parks Canada requires fabrication and supply of two stilling wells for Lock 5 and Lock 6 Trent Severn Waterway.
description: Parks Canada requires fabrication and supply of two stilling wells for Lock 5 and Lock 6 Trent Severn Waterway as per provided drawings. All fabricated units must be shipped to 2155 Ashburnham Drive, Peterborough, ON.
full_summary:
### **Government Tender Announcement**

#### **Title and Reference Information**

* **Contract Title:** [_5P315-220138 Stilling Well_](#title)
* **Reference Number:** [_WS3777746116-Doc3799379549_](#referenceNumber)

#### **About the Contract**

Parks Canada [Agency (PC)](###endUserEntitiesName) is seeking a contractor to fabricate and supply two stilling wells for Lock 5 and Lock 6 Trent Severn Waterway. The scope of work includes the fabrication of the stilling wells according to detailed drawings provided.

#### **Contract Details**

* **Publication Date:** 2022-12-22
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-12 at 14:00 (Eastern Standard Time)
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-03-30
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2023-04-30
* **Regions of Delivery:** Peterborough
* **Trade Agreements:** None

#### **Contractor Requirements**

* **Fabricate and supply two stilling wells according to provided drawings.**
* **Ship the fabricated stilling wells to 2155 Ashburnham Drive, Peterborough, ON.**

#### **Evaluation Method**

The contractor will be evaluated based on price.

#### **Contact Information**

For further information, please contact Yvonne Ocheoha at [Yvonne.Ocheoha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:yvonne.ocheoha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### **Access the RFX**

You can access the full contracting opportunity and associated documentation at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14961101?extsite=MTQ5NjExMDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14961101?extsite=MTQ5NjExMDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
